title: Consider the plastic drinking straw: Why do we suck so much?
body: 998. 86. r/environment. Join. • 2 mo. ago. Three Widely Used Pesticides Driving Hundreds of Endangered Species Toward Extinction, According to EPA. Analysis: The chemicals known as neonics are killing bees and other pollinators, polluting waters and ending up in people's urine. organicconsumers.org. 551.
